title: ICE: ` 'index out of bounds: the len is 1 but the index is 1', compiler/rustc_lint/src/internal.rs:481:82`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-nightly
labels.description: This issue requires a nightly compiler in some way.

labels.name: S-has-mcve
labels.description: A Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example has been found for this issue

body:
### Code `rustc -Zuntable-options file.rs` ```Rust fn parse_local() { struct_span_err(msg).emit(); } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.71.0-nightly (f9a6b7158 2023-05-05) binary: rustc commit-hash: f9a6b71580cd53dd4491d9bb6400f7ee841d9c22 commit-date: 2023-05-05 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.71.0-nightly LLVM version: 16.0.2 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
Backtrace
